room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Vector Escape Games in Redlands
room_address: 1765 Orange Tree Lane Unit B Redlands CA 92374
room_description: You have been invited back to your late grandmother Lucinda's mansion to claim your Inheritance, only to find an odd character living there Sam. Sam is a wizard in training, your grandmother's student. Sam has a deep connection with your grandmother and the home. Sam reluctant to give up the deed to the home, now you must become a wizard and outcast Sam in spells and riddles if you want your inheritance and your life!
